title: Registration Opens
brief: Sign up your team and secure your spot in the competition.
detail: Registration is now open for Aurora Labs' Global Strategy Case Competition. This is your chance to showcase your strategic thinking and analytical skills while working on a real-world business challenge.
highlights: Early bird registration includes exclusive mentorship sessions
Access to Aurora Labs' proprietary market research database
Networking opportunities with industry leaders and alumni
Teams must consist of 3-4 undergraduate or graduate students

title: Team Formation Deadline
brief: Finalize your team composition and submit team profiles.
detail: All teams must be finalized by this deadline. Use our team matching platform to connect with students who have complementary skills and backgrounds.
highlights: Submit team member profiles and skill assessments
Attend virtual team building workshops
Access to team collaboration tools and resources
Mentorship matching based on team composition

title: Case Release & Briefing Session
brief: Receive the complete case study and attend the live briefing session.
detail: The full case study will be released along with comprehensive datasets, market research, and detailed evaluation criteria. Teams will have access to Aurora Labs' internal data and strategic frameworks.
highlights: Live briefing session with Aurora Labs executives
Access to proprietary datasets and market intelligence
Detailed evaluation rubric and judging criteria
Weekly office hours with industry mentors and advisors

title: Final Submission Deadline
brief: Submit your comprehensive strategy presentation and supporting materials.
detail: Teams must submit their final presentations including strategic recommendations, market analysis, financial projections, and implementation roadmaps. Submissions will be evaluated by a panel of industry experts.
highlights: Submit 15-20 slide executive presentation
Include detailed financial model and projections
Provide comprehensive market analysis and competitive landscape
Submit implementation timeline and risk mitigation strategies

title: Finalists Announcement
brief: Top 6 teams advance to the final round of presentations.
detail: After rigorous evaluation, the top 6 teams will be selected to present their strategies to Aurora Labs' executive team and board of directors. Finalists will receive additional mentorship and presentation coaching.
highlights: Top 6 teams selected based on strategic insight and feasibility
Finalists receive executive presentation coaching
Access to additional market data and industry insights
One-on-one mentorship sessions with senior executives

title: Grand Finals & Awards Gala
brief: Live presentations to executive panel followed by awards ceremony.
detail: Finalist teams will present their strategies to Aurora Labs' executive team, board members, and industry leaders. The winning team will receive recognition and potential internship opportunities.
highlights: Live presentations to executive panel and board of directors
Q&A sessions with industry leaders and Aurora Labs executives
Awards ceremony with prizes and recognition
Networking reception with industry professionals and alumni
